metadata.title: CVE-2016-5608 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle VM VirtualBox component before5.0.28 and 5.1.x before 5.1.8 in Oracle Virtualization allows local usersto affect availability via vectors related to Core, a differentvulnerability than CVE-2016-5613.

criterions.comment: virtualbox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
